roleset.name: to free from bondage or oppression
roleset.note: EMANCIPATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'emancipate' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 10.5. (from emancipate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: This was what-1 *trace*-1 emancipated him from Leibnizianism, and at the same time turned him against sensationalism.

example.name: nominal rel: emancipation
example.text: Unlike us , you did n't experience the hard process of ideological emancipation in China , rinsing out bit by bit the toxic liquid infused into the marrow in the Old Mao era and crystallizing the need for individuality emancipation , freedom and democracy from your own life 's experiences .
